name: 4 Verify the Order Detail API, whether able to fetch order details
scenarioId: EcommerceAPI/EndtoEnd_E_commerce:4 Verify the Order Detail API, whether able to fetch order details
methodName: 4 Verify the Order Detail API, whether able to fetch order details

testSteps.description:
Given add headers to the API with below details:
| Authorization | Content-Type |
| token# | application/json |

And add query parameters to the API with below details:
| id |
| orders[0]# |
When user calls "FetchOrderDetails" API with "GET" request

Then validate the status "200" with below details:
| message | data.orderById | data.productOrderedId | data.productName |
| Orders fetched for customer Successfully | NotNull | NotNull | NotNull |

userStory.storyName: End to End E-commerce API validation
userStory.displayName: End to End E-commerce API validation
userStory.narrative: Verify the user can able to create a product and order as well as able to delete order and product.

title: 4 Verify the Order Detail API, whether able to fetch order details
